mapper.select: SELECT A.CLS_CD , A.REQ_DEPT_CD , A.REQ_DT , A.FIN_CD , (SELECT FINANCE_NAME FROM RR_FINANCE WHERE FINANCE_CD=A.FIN_CD) AS FIN_NM , A.SCRTS_NO , A.PRDLN_CD , (SELECT PRDLN_NM FROM TM_PRDLN_MNG WHERE USE_YN='Y' AND CLS_CD=A.CLS_CD AND REQ_DEPT_CD=A.REQ_DEPT_CD AND PRDLN_CD=A.PRDLN_CD) AS PRDLN_NM , NVL(MAX(DECODE(INSPC_SPR, 1, SCR)), 0) AS AUTO_SCR , NVL(MAX(DECODE(INSPC_SPR, 2, SCR)), 0) AS MANUAL_SCR , MAX(A.CTT_DT) AS CTT_DT , MAX(A.CTT_STTS) AS CTT_STTS , MAX(A.CTTOR_NM) AS CTTOR_NM , MAX(A.PRD_NM) AS PRD_NM FROM RR_TM001 A, TM_INSPC_RSLT B WHERE A.CLS_CD = B.CLS_CD(+) AND A.REQ_DEPT_CD = B.REQ_DEPT_CD(+) AND A.REQ_DT = B.REQ_DT(+) AND A.FIN_CD = B.FIN_CD(+) AND A.SCRTS_NO = B.SCRTS_NO(+) AND A.PRDLN_CD = B.PRDLN_CD(+) AND A.CLS_CD = #{cls_cd} AND A.REQ_DEPT_CD = #{req_dept_cd} AND A.REQ_DT = #{req_dt} AND A.FIN_CD = #{fin_cd} AND A.SCRTS_NO = #{scrts_no} GROUP BY A.CLS_CD, A.REQ_DEPT_CD, A.REQ_DT, A.FIN_CD, A.SCRTS_NO, A.PRDLN_CD

SELECT A.CLS_CD , A.REQ_DEPT_CD , A.REQ_DT , A.FIN_CD , A.SCRTS_NO , A.PRDLN_CD , (SELECT CD_NM FROM TM_CD_INF WHERE USE_YN='Y' AND GRP_CD='InspSpr' AND CD=B.INSPC_SPR) AS INSPC_SPR_NM , INSPC_SPR , SCR , ESN_KWD_NUM , ESN_KWD_SCR , BNWD_SCR , BNWD_CNT , OMSN_KWD_NUM , MAX(MISSELL_YN) OVER(PARTITION BY A.SCRTS_NO) AS MISSELL_YN FROM RR_TM001 A, TM_INSPC_RSLT B WHERE A.CLS_CD = B.CLS_CD(+) AND A.REQ_DEPT_CD = B.REQ_DEPT_CD(+) AND A.REQ_DT = B.REQ_DT(+) AND A.FIN_CD = B.FIN_CD(+) AND A.SCRTS_NO = B.SCRTS_NO(+) AND A.PRDLN_CD = B.PRDLN_CD(+) AND A.CLS_CD = #{cls_cd} AND A.REQ_DEPT_CD = #{req_dept_cd} AND A.REQ_DT = #{req_dt} AND A.FIN_CD = #{fin_cd} AND A.SCRTS_NO = #{scrts_no} ORDER BY INSPC_SPR

SELECT A.CLS_CD , A.REQ_DEPT_CD , A.FIN_CD , A.SCRTS_NO , A.REQ_DT , A.SAVE_FILE_NM , A.PRDLN_CD , A.RCD_FILE_NM , A.KWD_NM , A.APRNC_TM , LPAD(TRUNC((A.APRNC_TM/1000)/3600), 2, 0) || ':' || LPAD(TRUNC(MOD((A.APRNC_TM/1000), 3600)/60), 2, 0) || ':' || LPAD(TRUNC(MOD((A.APRNC_TM/1000), 60)), 2, 0) AS APRNC_DT , DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY B.RCDFL_SNO) -1 AS IDX FROM TM_KWD_RSLT A, RR_TM002 B WHERE A.CLS_CD=B.CLS_CD AND A.REQ_DEPT_CD=B.REQ_DEPT_CD AND A.FIN_CD=B.FIN_CD AND A.REQ_DT=B.REQ_DT AND A.SCRTS_NO=B.SCRTS_NO AND A.RCD_FILE_NM=B.RCD_FILE_NM AND A.CLS_CD = #{cls_cd} AND A.REQ_DEPT_CD = #{req_dept_cd} AND A.REQ_DT = #{req_dt} AND A.FIN_CD = #{fin_cd} AND A.SCRTS_NO = #{scrts_no} AND A.PRDLN_CD=#{prdln_cd} AND A.KWD_SPR=#{kwd_spr} AND A.INSPC_SPR = '1' ORDER BY A.RCD_FILE_NM ASC, B.RCDFL_SNO ASC, A.APRNC_TM ASC
